Action.Name: AddChannelAccessProfilePrivileges
Action.Description: Adds entity privileges to a channel access profile.

Action.Description: Adds members to a list.

The members to be added to the list.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to be added.
The privileges for an existing role.
Unique name of the solution.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from AddPrivilegesRole action.

Action.Name: AddProductToKit
Action.Description: Adds a product to a kit. (Deprecated)

Parameters.Parameter: ID of the kit the product is added to.
ID of the product to add to a kit.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from AddProductToKit action.

Action.Name: AddRecurrence
Action.Description: Adds recurrence information to an existing appointment.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to be added.
The recurring appointment master record to which the appointment is converted.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from AddRecurrence action.

Action.Name: AddSolutionComponent
Action.Description: Adds a solution component to an unmanaged solution.

Parameters.Parameter: Indicates whether other solution components that are required by the solution component should also be added to the unmanaged solution.
ID of the solution component.
The solution component to add to the unmanaged solution.
Indicates whether the subcomponents should be included.
Any settings to be included with the component.
Unique name of the solution.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from AddSolutionComponent action.

Action.Name: AddSubstituteProduct
Action.Description: Adds a link between two entity instances in a many-to-many relationship. (Deprecated)

Parameters.Parameter: Product to be added. (Deprecated)
ID of the product. (Deprecated)

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from AddSubstituteProduct action.

Action.Name: AddToQueue
Action.Description: Moves an entity record from a source queue to a destination queue.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to move from source queue to destination queue.
Properties required to create a queue item in the destination queue.
The source queue.
The destination queue.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from AddToQueue action.

Action.Description: Adds a user to the auto created access team for the specified record.

Team template that is used to create the access team.

Action.Name: ApplyProfileRule
Action.Description: For internal use only.
Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from ApplyProfileRule action.

Action.Name: ApplyRecordCreationAndUpdateRule
Action.Description: Applies record creation and update rules to activities in CRM created as a result of the integration with external applications.

Action.Name: ApplyRoutingRule

Action.Name: AutoMapEntity
Action.Description: Generates a new set of attribute mappings based on the metadata.

Action.Name: Book
Action.Description: Schedules or “books” an appointment, recurring appointment, or service appointment (service activity).

Parameters.Parameter: For internal use only.
For internal use only.
The record that is the target of the book operation.

Action.Name: CalculatePrice

Action.Name: CanBeReferenced
Action.Description: Checks whether the specified entity can be the primary entity (one) in a one-to-many relationship.

Action.Name: CanBeReferencing
Action.Description: Checkes whether an entity can be the referencing entity in a one-to-many relationship.

Parameters.Parameter: Logical entity name.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CanBeReferencing action.

Action.Name: CancelContract
Action.Description: Cancels a contract.

Parameters.Parameter: The date the contract was cancelled.
ID of the contract.
Status of the contract.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CancelContract action.

Action.Name: CancelSalesOrder
Action.Description: Cancels a sales order.

Parameters.Parameter: The close activity that is associated with the sales order (order) that is to be cancelled.
Status of the sales order.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CancelSalesOrder action.

Action.Name: CanManyToMany
Action.Description: Checks whether an entity can participate in a many-to-many relationship.

Parameters.Parameter: Name of the entity.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CanManyToMany action.

Action.Name: CloneAsPatch
Action.Description: Creates a solution patch from a managed or unmanaged solution.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the patch.
The unique name of the parent solution.
The version number of the patch. The version must be greater than the parent solution but have the same major.minor number.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CloneAsPatch action.

Action.Name: CloneAsSolution
Action.Description: Creates a new copy of an unmanged solution that contains the original solution plus all of its patches.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the cloned solution.
The name of the parent solution. This name must be the same as the parent name in the original solution that was cloned.
The version number of the cloned solution. The cloned solution major.minor version number must be a higher than the original solution that was cloned.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CloneAsSolution action.

Action.Name: CloneContract
Action.Description: Copies an existing contract and its line items.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to be copied.
Indicates whether the canceled line items of the originating contract are to be included in the copy.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CloneContract action.

Action.Name: CloneProduct
Action.Description: Copies an existing product family, product, or bundle under the same parent record.

Parameters.Parameter: The source product family, product, or bundle record that you want to clone.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CloneProduct action.

Action.Name: CloseIncident
Action.Description: Closes an incident (case).

Parameters.Parameter: Incident resolution (case resolution) that is associated with the incident (case) to be closed.
Status of the incident.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the CloseIncident action.

Action.Name: CloseQuote
Action.Description: Closes a quote.

Parameters.Parameter: A quote to be closed.
Status of the quote.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from CloseQuote action.

Indicates whether to send an email about the new activity.

Action.Name: DeleteAuditData

Action.Name: DeleteOpenInstances

The name of the option set that contains the value.
The solution name associated with this option value.
The value of the option to delete.

Action.Name: DeliverIncomingEmail
Action.Description: Creates an email activity record from an incoming email message.

Parameters.Parameter: Collection of activity mime attachment (email attachment) instances to attach to the email message.
Addresses of the blind carbon copy (Bcc) recipients for the email message.
The message body for the email.
The addresses of the carbon copy (Cc) recipients for the email message.
The email activity record to create.
For internal use only.
The from address for the email message.
The level of importance for the email message.
The ID of the email message stored in the email header.
The time the message was received on.
The subject line for the email message.
The email address of the account that is creating the email activity instance.
The addresses of the recipients of the email message.
Indicates whether to validate before the create operation occurs.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the DeliverIncomingEmail Action.

Action.Name: DeliverPromoteEmail
Action.Description: Creates an email activity record from the specified email message

Addresses of the blind carbon copy (Bcc) recipients for the email message.
The message body for the email.
The addresses of the carbon copy (Cc) recipients for the email message.
The email activity record to create.
For internal use only.
The from address for the email message.
The level of importance for the email message.
The ID of the email message stored in the email header.
The time the message was received on.
The subject line for the email message.
The email address of the account that is creating the email activity instance.
The addresses of the recipients of the email message.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the DeliverPromoteEmail Action.

The ownership options for the activity.
Indicates whether an asynchronous job is used to distribute activities, such as an email, fax, or letter, to the members of a list.
Indicates whether the activity is both created and executed.
The queue to which the created activity is added.
Indicates whether to send an email about the new activity.
The email template.

Action.Description: Recalculate system-computed values for rollup fields in the goal hierarchy.

Parameters.Parameter: Data needed to recalculate system computed values.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from Recalculate Action.

Action.Name: ReleaseToQueue
Action.Description: Assigns a queue item back to the queue owner so others can pick it.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to assign back to the queue.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from ReleaseToQueue Action.

Action.Name: RemoveFromQueue
Action.Description: Removes a queue item from a queue.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to be removed.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemoveFromQueue Action.

Action.Name: RemoveItemCampaign
Action.Description: Removes an item from a campaign.

Parameters.Parameter: The item to be removed from the campaign.
Data needed to remove the item.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemoveItemCampaign Action.

Action.Name: RemoveItemCampaignActivity
Action.Description: Removes an item from a campaign activity.

Parameters.Parameter: The item to be removed from the campaign activity.
Data needed to remove the item.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemoveItemCampaignActivity Action.

Action.Name: RemoveMemberList
Action.Description: Removes a member from a list (marketing list).

Parameters.Parameter: Data needed to remove a member.
Member to be removed from the list.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemoveMemberList Action.

Action.Name: RemoveMembersTeam
Action.Description: Removes members from a team.

Parameters.Parameter: The team to remove members from.
The members to remove.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemoveMembersTeam Action.

Action.Name: RemoveParent
Action.Description: Removes the parent for a system user (user) record.

Parameters.Parameter: The target systemuser (user) record for the operation.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemoveParent Action.

Action.Name: RemovePrivilegeRole
Action.Description: Removes a privilege from an existing role.

Parameters.Parameter: Data needed to remove a privilege.
The privilege that is to be removed from the existing role.
Unique name of the solution.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemovePrivilegeRole Action.

Action.Name: RemoveProductFromKit
Action.Description: Removes a product from a kit. (Deprecated)

Parameters.Parameter: Data needed to remove a product.
The product to be removed.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RemoveProductFromKit Action.

Action.Name: RemoveRelated
Action.Description: Removes the relationship between the specified records for specific relationships.

Parameters.Parameter: Target records from which to remove the specific related records.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the RemoveRelated Action.

Action.Name: RemoveSolutionComponent
Action.Description: Removes a component from an unmanaged solution.

Parameters.Parameter: The type of solution component.
Solution component to add.
Unique name of the solution.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the RemoveSolutionComponent Action.

Action.Name: RemoveSubstituteProduct
Action.Description: Deprecated.

Parameters.Parameter: Deprecated
Deprecated

Action.Name: RemoveUserFromRecordTeam
Action.Description: Removes a user from the auto created access team for the specified record.

Parameters.Parameter: Data needed to remove a user.
The record for which the access team is auto created.
The team template which is used to create the access team.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the RemoveUserFromRecordTeam Action.

Action.Name: RenewContract
Action.Description: Renews a contract and create the contract details for a new contract.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to be created.
Indicates whether the canceled line items of the original contract should be included in the renewed contract.
The status of the contract.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the RenewContract Action.

Action.Name: RenewEntitlement
Action.Description: Renews an entitlement.

Parameters.Parameter: An instance of the entitlement.
The StatusCode value for the renewed Entitlement

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RenewEntitlement Action.

Action.Name: ReplacePrivilegesRole
Action.Description: Replaces the privilege set of an existing role.

Parameters.Parameter: An instance of the existing role.
An array that contains the IDs and depths of the privileges that replace the existing privileges.
Unique name of the solution.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from ReplacePrivilegesRole Action.

Action.Name: Reschedule
Action.Description: Reschedules an appointment, recurring appointment, or service appointment (service activity).

Parameters.Parameter: For internal use only.
For internal use only.
The target of the reschedule operation.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from Reschedule Action.

Action.Name: ResetUserFilters
Action.Description: Resets the offline data filters for the calling user to the default filters for the organization.

Parameters.Parameter: The type of filters to set.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the ResetUserFilters Action.

Action.Name: RevertProduct
Action.Description: Reverts changes done to properties of a product family, product, or bundle record, and set it back to its last published (active) state.

Parameters.Parameter: The target product family, product, or bundle record for which you want to revert the changes done to its properties since it was last published.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the RevertProduct Action.

Action.Name: ReviseQuote
Action.Description: Sets the state of a quote to Draft.

Parameters.Parameter: Collection of attributes to retrieve in the revised quote.
The ID of the original quote.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from ReviseQuote Action.

Action.Name: RevokeAccess
Action.Description: Replaces the access rights on the target record for the specified security principal (user or team).

Parameters.Parameter: A security principal (team or user) whose access you want to revoke.
The target record for which you want to revoke access.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the RevokeAccess Action.

Action.Name: RouteTo
Action.Description: Routes a queue item to a queue, a user, or a team.

Parameters.Parameter: The queue item to be routed.
The user, team or queue to which the queue item is routed to.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from RouteTo Action.

Action.Name: SendEmail
Action.Description: Sends an e-mail message.

Parameters.Parameter: The email record.
Indicates whether the email is to be sent or marked as sent.
The token to track the email.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the SendEmail Action.

Action.Name: SendEmailFromTemplate
Action.Description: Sends an e-mail message to a recipient using an e-mail template.

Parameters.Parameter: The entity record with which the e-mail message is associated.
The recipient the email is sent to.
ID of the email template to use.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the SendEmailFromTemplate Action.

Action.Name: SendFax
Action.Description: Sends a fax.

Parameters.Parameter: The fax ID.
Indicates whether to send the e-mail, or to just record it as sent.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from SendFax Action.

Action.Name: SendTemplate
Action.Description: Sends a bulk email message that is created from a template.

Parameters.Parameter: The delivery priority code for the email.
The list of recipients for the email.
The record the email is regarding.
The sender of the email.
The ID of the template.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from SendTemplate Action.

Action.Name: SetBusinessEquipment
Action.Description: Assigns equipment (facility/equipment) to a specific business unit.

Parameters.Parameter: The buisness unit ID.
The equipment ID.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from SetBusinessEquipment Action.

Action.Name: SetBusinessSystemUser
Action.Description: Moves a system user (user) to a different business unit.

Parameters.Parameter: The business unit to which the user needs to be moved.
The user instance.
The target security principal (user) to which the instances of entities previously owned by the user are to be assigned.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the SetBusinessSystemUser Action.

Action.Name: SetDataEncryptionKey
Action.Description: Sets or restore the data encryption key.

Parameters.Parameter: The operation to perform with the data encryption key
The value of the data encryption key.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the reponse from the SetDataEncryptionKey Action.

Action.Name: SetLocLabels
Action.Description: Sets localized labels for a limited set of entity attributes.

Parameters.Parameter: The attribute name.
The entity.
The labels to set.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from SetLocLabels Action.

Action.Name: SetParentSystemUser
Action.Description: Sets a new parent system user (user) for the specified user.

Parameters.Parameter: The specified user instance.
Indicates whether the child users are to be retained.
The new parent user.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the SetParentSystemUser Action.

Action.Name: SetProcess
Action.Description: Sets the process that associates with a given target entity. The user can set to another business process or specify null to clear out the current process.

Parameters.Parameter: The new process to be set to the target entity, or null.
The target entity.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from SetProcess Action.

Action.Name: SetRelated
Action.Description: Creates a relationship between a set of records that participate in specific relationships.

Parameters.Parameter: The target records of the set related action.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from SetRelated Action.

Action.Name: SetReportRelated
Action.Description: Links an instance of a report entity to related entities.

Parameters.Parameter: An array of report category codes.
An array of entity type codes for the related entities
The ID of the report.
An array of report visibility codes.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from SetReportRelated Action.

Action.Name: TransformImport
Action.Description: Submits an asynchronous job that transforms the parsed data.

Parameters.Parameter: The ID of the import (data import) that is associated with the asynchronous job that transforms the imported data.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the TransformImport Action.

Action.Name: TriggerServiceEndpointCheck
Action.Description: Validates the configuration of a Microsoft Azure Service Bus solution’s service endpoint.

Parameters.Parameter: The ServiceEndpoint record that contains the configuration.

Action.ReturnType: NA

Action.Name: UninstallSampleData
Action.Description: Uninstalls the sample data.
Action.ReturnType: UninstallSampleData Action does not have a ReturnType

Action.Name: UnlockInvoicePricing
Action.Description: Unlocks pricing for an invoice.

Parameters.Parameter: ID of the invoice.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the UnlockInvoicePricing Action.

Action.Name: UnlockSalesOrderPricing
Action.Description: Unlocks pricing for a sales order (order).

Parameters.Parameter: The ID of the sales order.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from UnlockSalesOrderPricing Action ReturnType.

Action.Name: UnpublishDuplicateRule
Action.Description: Submits an asynchronous job to unpublish a duplicate rule.

Parameters.Parameter: the ID of the duplicate rule to be unpublished.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from UnpublishDuplicateRule Action.

Action.Name: UpdateOptionValue
Action.Description: Updates an option value in a global or local option set.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the attribute when updating a local option set in a picklist attribute.
Description for the option.
The logical name of the entity when updating the local option set in a picklist attribute.
The label for the option.
Indicates whether to keep text defined for languages not included in the Label.
The name of the global option set.
The name of the unmanaged solution that this global option set should be associated with.
The value for the option.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the UpdateOptionValue Action.

Action.Name: UpdateProductProperties
Action.Description: Updates values of the property instances (dynamic property instances) for a product added to an opportunity, quote, order, or invoice.

Parameters.Parameter: The property instances (dynamic property instances) for a product to be updated.

Action.ReturnType: The UpdateProductProperties Action does not have a return type.

Action.Name: UpdateSolutionComponent
Action.Description: Updates a component in an unmanaged solution.

Parameters.Parameter: The unique identifier of the component to update.
The type of component being updated.
Any settings to be included in the component update.
The unique name of the solution where the component should exist.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from UpdateSolutionComponent Action.

Action.Name: UpdateStateValue
Action.Description: Updates an option set value in for a StateAttributeMetadata attribute.

Parameters.Parameter: The logical name of the attribute.
The default value for the statuscode (status reason) attribute when this statecode value is set.
The description label for the statecode option that is specified in the Value property.
The name of the entity that has this statecode attribute.
The display label for this statecode option that is specified by the Value property.
Indicates whether to merge the current label with any existing labels that are already specified for this attribute.
For internal use only.
The statecode attribute options to update.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from UpdateStateValue Action.

Action.Name: UpdateUserSettingsSystemUser
Action.Description: Deprecated.

Parameters.Parameter: Deprecated.
Deprecated.

Action.ReturnType: Deprecated.

Action.Name: Validate
Action.Description: Verifies that an appointment or service appointment (service activity) has valid available resources for the activity, duration, and site, as appropriate.

Parameters.Parameter: The activities to validate.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the Validate Action.

Action.Name: ValidateSavedQuery
Action.Description: Validates a saved query.

Parameters.Parameter: This action is bound to the SavedQuery collection
The FetchXML query string to be validated
The type of the query.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the ValidateSavedQuery Action.

Action.Name: WinOpportunity
Action.Description: Sets the state of an opportunity to Won.

Parameters.Parameter: The opportunity close activity associated with this state change.
Status of the opportunity.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the WinOpportunity Action.

Action.Name: WinQuote
Action.Description: Sets the state of a quote to Won.

Parameters.Parameter: The quote close activity associated with this state change.
Status of the quote.

Action.ReturnType: Contains the response from the WinQuote Action.
